features: Fluoride Free, alcohol-free, natural whitening, cruelty free, no artificial flavors. A perfect fresh & healthy natural mouthwash for kids.
Elementa Essentials uses a patent-pending, cutting edge, Nano-Silver technology designed to penetrate plaque and neutralize oral pH while delivering minerals.
Toddler to Teen. Our plant based nano silver is antibacterial, non-toxic, non-burning, and opens holes in your plaque to neutralize oral acid and deliver calcium.

A mouthwash kids will love, results parents will appreciate. Shown to eliminate harmful bacteria that cause cavities and bad breath as well as soothes dry mouth by increasing salivary flow.,Children’s brushing and flossing doesn't always do the complete job.
A supplemental wash with Elementa Silver mouthwash can help with canker sores, keep tartar out of hard to reach places.
body.description: Nano silver+ Xylitol + Calcium. Alcohol free. SLS free. fluoride free. Safe for kids. Non Burning. Neutralizes oral acid. Kills bad bacteria. Dentst formulated with plant silver. Sugar doesn't cause cavities, acid does. Despite popular belief, sometimes brushing more and eating less sugar still doesn't prevent cavities. Traditional oral care products aren't fighting the real issue, bad pH levels. Harmful oral acid is created when carbs we eat are consumed by bacteria . Carbs/Sugar + Bacteria = Acid. Most mouth rinse brands attempt to kill bacteria with formulas that only introduce more acid into the mouth. Our Nano Silver Rinse neutralizes acid, targets bad bacteria and delivers Calcium + Xylitol directly to your teeth. See where your current product lands on the pH scale. BFP Nanotech: Our patent-pending technology uses plant-based Nano SIlver particles to open channels in the BioFilm, aka plague, to allow the tooth to uptake much needed calcium & xylitol while neutralizing oral acid. We created this revolutionary breakthrough because, as dentists, we were frustrated by other products that merely bounce off of the BioFIlm barrier and have marginal effects on your teeth. Dentist Formulated: We are Dentists. We engineered this formula because we were tired of telling patients to brush more and enjoy sugar less, even though those things weren't solving the issues. Our revolutionary BFP Nano Tech breakthrough is changing the way dentists have looked at dental products for the last 100 years. Ray Nar. Matt Callister. Diabetic safe. ElementaSilver.com. Test Your Rinse: Order a free test kit to find out where your current mouth rinse lands on the pH scale at ElemntaSilver.com. No animal ingredients. Please recycle. These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Made in the USA.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing mouth wash for kids!
reviews.reviewText: I got this mouthwash because my son needs assistance with his teeth. It tastes great for kids and he has used it daily without any fuss. The bottle is huge compared to other mouthwash bottles. 10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter enjoys this child safe mouthwash. My only complaint is the sturdy container somehow constantly leaks. Even when I wipe the bottle off I end up coming back and finding rings on the counter where it sits.We tried this Elementa and Spry brand. My daughter prefers this Elementa and my younger son the Spry. I think this Elementa one is a slightly stronger feel/taste in the mouth. I'm happy with the ingredients and hoping we see positive dental results.As with any open bottle my kids will spill it. A pump version would really make me happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Seal broke + Leak
reviews.reviewText: It came very dirty and the seal was broke. I liked the adult cinnamon and it came in great condition. I'd love to try one that doesn't have the seal broke before opening.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kid loves it
reviews.reviewText: It’s a great flavor and works so good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I use the adult mint flavor so I bought this for my kids and they really love it. Obviously wish it was more affordable but overall we like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Opened up our newest bottle and the top had this glass like shards all over it. I’m thinking it may be xylitol that did not dissolve properly? I tried seeing if it would dissolve but it wasn’t dissolved after running under water a few minutes.
